p: Even though naturally occurring substances as an essential part of edible plants and their products should pose no health risk, we cannot presume that the same applies for isolated compounds in higher doses and for other formulations especially in the form of phytopharmaceutical drugs. Therefore, also in the case of a naturally occurring substance with proven health-promoting effects, testing for potential toxicity and use of limited concentrations is essential for safe use. Several testing methods and protocols exist for the toxicological evaluation of compounds, some even in silico [ 48].
